title: Fundamentals
description: Understand the absolute basics and start building your confidence.

title: What is Coding?
description: Before you start learning how to code, you need to understand what coding actually is!

title: Comments
description: Annotate your code so your future self, and others, can understand it.

title: Data Types
description: Data types are a fundamental concept in programming. They are used to represent different types of data.

title: Strings
description: Strings are a fundamental concept in programming. They are used to represent text, words, and characters.

title: Using Strings
description: Learn how to use strings in your code.

title: Indexing Strings
description: Learn how to access a letter by its index

title: Numbers
description: Numbers are a fundamental concept in programming, both for anything involving maths, but also for day-to-day programming.

title: Functions
description: Master a fundamental building block of programs - functions.

title: What are Functions?
description: Learn what functions are in programming.

title: Using Functions
description: Learn how to use basic functions.

title: Function Inputs
description: Learn how to pass inputs (also known as 'arguments') into functions.

title: Defining Functions
description: Learn about to define (or make) you're own functions

title: Inside a function
description: Learn about what happens inside a function

title: Conditionals
description: Learn about if statements.

title: Else Statements
description: Learn about else statements.

title: For each statements
description: For each statements allow you to loop through a list or string.

title: Lists
description: Lists allow us to store multiple pieces of data together in order.

title: Variables
description: Master a fundamental building block of programs - variables.

title: What are Variables?
description: Learn what variables are in programming.

title: Creating variables
description: Learn how to create variables

title: Change variables
description: Learn how to change variables

title: Unique Variable names
description: Learn about how variable names have to be unique

title: Using Variables
description: Learn how to use variables as inputs to functions.

title: Flow control
description: Learn about different ways to control what the program does.

title: Using Repeat Blocks
description: Learn how to use repeat blocks

title: Index Access Chaining
description: Learn how to chain index accessors

title: Lists of Lists
description: Learn how to to put lists inside of lists

title: Dictionaries
description: Learn everything about dictionaries

title: Next and Break
description: Learn about the next and break keywords

title: Indexed By
description: Learn about keeping track of the iteration you're on with indexed by.

title: Objects
description: Learn about objects - the building block of object-oriented programming.

title: Introduction to Objects
description: Grasp what objects are and why you would use them.

title: Creating Objects
description: Learn how to use the new keyword to create objects

title: Object Properties
description: Learn how to read and write properties from objects.

title: Using objects in functions
description: Learn how we pass references to objects into functions.

title: HTML Basics
description: Learn the basics of HTML

title: CSS Basics
description: Learn the basics of CSS

title: JavaScript Basics
description: Learn the basics of JavaScript
